title: Justin Bieber takes his new electric bicycle for a ride through his Beverly Hills neighborhood
text:
Justin Bieber has been known to have a taste for exotic and luxurious cars and motorcycles.

But in recent weeks, the pop superstar has been spotted cruising around his Beverly Hills neighborhood on his new electric bike.

It looks similar to a motocross bicycle, only his two-wheeler can also motor down the street without the help of the rider peddling at all.

Need for speed: Justin Bieber, 25, was spotted taking his new electric bicycle for a ride through his Beverly Hills neighborhood on Tuesday

Bieber, 25, was spotted driving along on his new toy, dressed in dark sports shorts and a black t-shirt.

He also donned white sneakers and a black baseball cap over his short brown hair, instead of a helmet.

It's believed the singer had the electric bike delivered to his home, not long before he tied-the-knot for a second time with wife Hailey Baldwin at the Montage Palmetto Bluff resort in South Carolina on September 30.

Fun in the sun: The pop superstar was dressed in dark sports shorts, a black t-shirt and white sneakers for his spin on his electric bike around his neighborhood

He's hooked: Bieber has also been seen cruising in her neighborhood on his motorcycles; he's seen popping a wheelie on August 27

He has been seen a number of times speeding through traffic around the streets near his home in Beverly Hills.

The pop star has amassed quite the collection of exotic rides ranging from Segway hoverboards and a customized Drew motorcycle to sports cars and pink Lamborghini trucks.

Bieber's collection over the years has included: a black Range Rover, a Fisker Karma, a Ferrari 458 Italia, a Cadillac CTS-V Coupe, a Smart Car, a Ducati 848 Evo, a Range Rover Evoque, a Lamborghini Gallardo, a Lamborghini Aventador, a Porsche Turbo 997, a custom H@ Hummer and a Ferrari 430. 7, according to Hot Cars.

Love of rides: The Canadian native has also flaunted his many exotic cars in his collection over the years; he is pictured alongside one of them in a photo that was shared August 18

The growing collection: Bieber shared a picture of his custom Drew motorcycle and a few of the cars he keeps at his home in Beverly Hills

Bieber is currently riding high right now following the release of his collaboration with Dan + Shay on the song 10,000 Hours.

The music video features Bieber serenading over his wife Hailey Baldwin, along with country crooners Dan Smyers and his wife, Abby Law, and Shay Mooney and his spouse, Hannah Billingsley.

Bieber is also expected to release a new studio album before 2020 rolls in.

In an Instagram Live video re-shared by a fan account, the singer announced he's 'putting an album out by the end this year, and another song coming out ... soon.'
description: Justin Bieber took his new electric bicycle for a ride through his Beverly Hills neighborhood on Tuesday, dressed in dark shorts, a black t-shirt and white sneakers.
